Properties.ProtectedString:
local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PointLight = Handle:WaitForChild("PointLight")
LungeSound = Handle:WaitForChild("LungeSound")
Lunge = Tool:WaitForChild("Lunge") Charge = Tool:WaitForChild("Charge")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Equipped = false SpecialCharging = false SpecialChargeTime = 10 SpecialDuration = 15
LungeDamage = 35 ProjectileDamage = 30 ReloadTime = 0.1
function RayCast(Pos, Dir, Max, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Pos, Dir.unit * (Max or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Blow(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then local right_arm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if right_arm then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint and (joint.Part0 == Handle or joint.Part1 == Handle) then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(LungeDamage) end end end end end
function Fire() if Tool.Enabled and Humanoid.Health > 0 then
local Distance = math.random(5, 15) local CurrentCharge = 5 local Projectile = Instance.new("Part") Projectile.Name = "Projectile" Projectile.Transparency = 0.000001 Projectile.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Projectile.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic Projectile.CanCollide = false Projectile.Anchored = false Projectile.Locked = true Projectile.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, Distance) local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=149427420" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=149427485" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(3, 1 + CurrentCharge, ((Distance * 2) + (Distance / 2) + (Distance / 6))) Projectile.Size = Vector3.new(Projectile.Size.X, (Mesh.Scale.Y / 4), Projectile.Size.Z) Mesh.Parent = Projectile local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, Projectile:GetMass() * 196.20, 0) BodyForce.Parent = Projectile Projectile.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit ~= Handle then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(ProjectileDamage) end Projectile:Destroy() end end) Debris:AddItem(Projectile, 5) Projectile.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
local HandleClone = Handle:Clone() HandleClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(HandleClone.Position) HandleClone.CFrame = HandleClone.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.random(-math.pi,math.pi), math.random(-math.pi,math.pi), math.random(-math.pi,math.pi)) local StartingPosition = (HandleClone.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * Projectile.Size.Z) local TargetPoint = (StartingPosition + StartingPosition.lookVector * 2)
Projectile.CFrame = StartingPosition Projectile.CFrame = CFrame.new(Projectile.Position, TargetPoint.p) Projectile.Velocity = CFrame.new(StartingPosition.p, TargetPoint.p).lookVector * 150
end end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled and not SpecialCharging then Tool.Enabled = false LungeAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Lunge) if LungeAnim then LungeSound:Play() LungeAnim:Play() wait(0.4) LungeAnim:Stop() end wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function RandomColor() local Randomize = math.random(1, 2) return ((Randomize == 1 and BrickColor.new(math.random(), math.random(), math.random())) or (Randomize == 2 and BrickColor.Random())).Color end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 24 if not Character or not Humanoid then return end Equipped = true if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" then SpecialCharging = true Spawn(function() ChargeAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Charge) if ChargeAnim then ChargeAnim:Play() end local ChargeTick = tick() PointLight.Enabled = true while Equipped and SpecialCharging and (tick() - ChargeTick) < SpecialChargeTime do PointLight.Color = RandomColor() PointLight.Brightness = (PointLight.Brightness + 0.25) wait(0.25) end PointLight.Brightness = 1 PointLight.Enabled = false if ChargeAnim then ChargeAnim:Stop() end if SpecialCharging then SpecialCharging = false local FireTick = tick() while Equipped and Equipped and (tick() - FireTick) < SpecialDuration do if Equipped and (tick() - ChargeTick) >= SpecialChargeTime then for i = 1, math.random(1, 5) do Fire() end end wait(0.125) end end end) end end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" then SpecialCharging = false end end) end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false SpecialCharging = false PointLight.Brightness = 1 PointLight.Enabled = false if LungeAnim then LungeAnim:Stop() end if ChargeAnim then ChargeAnim:Stop() end Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end
Handle.Touched:connect(Blow)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
